item.name: Cthulhu Wars
item.comment: Own Ancients faction, High Priests expansion, and a number of other random expansions/promos for this. Not even close to owning everything.

item.name: Dominion
item.comment:
Rating assumes playing with (all) the expansions.
Own all expansions. Own almost all promos.

item.name: Eclipse
item.comment: Own Rise of the Ancients & Shadow of the Rift

item.name: Eminent Domain: Microcosm
item.comment: The fact that it's fast means it will get played more than this rating would suggest.

item.name: The Extraordinary Adventures of Baron Munchausen
Fealty
item.comment: Still haven't fully decided how I feel about this game. I think I've played it three times so far.

item.name: The Little Prince: Make Me a Planet
The Little Prince: Rising to the Stars
The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game
Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Deck-Building Game
Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition
The Settlers of Catan
item.comment: Own 5-6 player expansion and Explorers & Pirates.

item.name: Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients
item.comment:
Becoming more and more convinced that despite the fact that it fixes some of the issues in Warhammer Quest, it's still an inferior game.
In particular, the manuals are some of the worst I've seen in a game.

item.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Swamps of Death
Star Wars Customizable Card Game
item.comment: A single sealed tournament deck, as well as a bunch of open cards.

item.name: Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon
The Three Musketeers: The Queen's Pendants
War of the Ring (Second Edition)
item.wishlistcomment: With Lords of Middle Earth expansion.

item.name: Warhammer: Diskwars
item.comment: Own both expansions and the Bloodgreed scenario. Would love the Witchfate Tor scenario.

item.name: Warhammer: The Mass Combat Fantasy Roleplaying Game (1st Edition)
item.comment: Lots of stuff, and almost all of the books. While I still enjoy the game, I'm just not sure if I'll ever get a chance to play it again; there's no local "Oldhammer" community, and I was never into the hobby, just the game.

item.name: Word Domination
item.comment: Box doesn't fit base game components. That's pretty sad for a word game.
